title: Emote spam makes League look like a joke
body:
All minions spamming emotes makes league look like a joke

Or is the game already a joke

[ALSO, mod CaptainMårvelous deleted the thread while sending a message my thread should be in GD, why not do your job and move it ]

[Edit: PSA: mods can ONLY delete threads, and send an automated message to the poster, NOT move threads (my bad didn't know that)]
